title: New: Giganta – Is Ma Beat
body:
Athens-based producer [**Giganta**](https://www.

facebook.com/Giganta.Music) will release her debut EP, _Force_, on [**Werk Discs/Ninja Tune**](http://ninjatune.net/release/giganta/force) on March 17th. ‘Is Ma Beat’ is the first tune from the aforementioned release is a track that builds on [**Giganta**](https://www.facebook.com/Giganta.Music)‘s dancehall philosophy with a frenzied beat and robotic vocal samples, ending up a mind-blowing, twisted R&B hybrid that will appeal to all the dancefloor lovers out there. The song weaves a pixelated magic spell and I feel privileged to groove under its influence! You can pick up _Force _on 12” or good old-fashioned download soon.
